author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1748.  Fix tasktracker to be able to launch tasks when log directory is relative.  Contributed by Owen.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1767.  Add 'bin/hadoop job -list' sub-command.  Contributed by Christophe Taton.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1601.  Change GenericWritable to use ReflectionUtils for instance creation.  Contributed by Enis.

author: ivaynberg
msg: apparently getting last modified date on a resource in jar fails, this leads to the log being flooded with the error messages because modification task runs once a second by default. so first we check if the error is for a resource inside a jar and log it with debug if it is

author: snoopdave
msg: More progress on permssions, adding support for pending permissions
